Element.Name: ADDITIONAL SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about additional supporting documents substantiating the claims made in the Invoice. The additional supporting documents can be used for both referencing a document number which is expected to be known by the receiver, an external document (referenced by a URL) or as an embedded document, Base64 encoded (such as a time report).

Element.Name: Invoiced object identifier, Supporting document reference
Element.Description: An identifier for an object on which the invoice is based, given by the Seller, or the identifier for the supporting document.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Invoiced object identifier.

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: Code "130" MUST be used to indicate an invoice object reference. Not used for other additional documents

Element.Name: Supporting document description
Element.Description: A description of the supporting document, such as: timesheet, usage report etc.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: An attached document embedded as binary object (Base64) or sent together with the invoice.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External document location
Element.Description: The URL (Uniform Resource Locator) that identifies where the external document is located. A means of locating the resource, including its primary access mechanism, e.g. http:// or ftp://.
